title: KFCradio: Neal Brennan, Josh Gordon News Breaks, and Best Characters for The Purge
description:
Neal Brennan stops by (1:00) to talk about Chappelle's Show, 3 Mics, Half Baked, the extraordinarilyÂ petty thing he did to Donald Glover, the meanest think Chris Rock ever said to him, The Champs and his upcoming comedy tour. Voicemails (54:56) include: dealing with a hot teacher, which characters to put in The Purge, and girlfriend wants to be an uber driver.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
